channel.title: Can't change aspect ratio & Fov issue
channel.description:
[b]Aspect Ratio Issue[/b] I've got a 16:10 screen and I wanted to change the aspect ratio from default 4 : 3 @ 1024x768 to 16:10 @ 1024x768. I tried to change the Ar using the UI but whenever I pressed the apply button nothing happened. I changed the AR on half-life 2 on the same pc without any problem.
[b]FOV issue[/b] I Tried to increase the field of view(advanced options) to have a wider view, instead of resizing, the engine crop as you can see in this img:
-Look at the subtitles- ![](upload://oUxR1dWsbFxdFdVXNerJF1a0J0t.jpeg)
[b]my spec:[/b] Windows 7 32 bit Intel CoreDuo T9300 @ 2.50 Ghz Ram: 3 Gb Nvidia Geforce 9500m
